EmailTemplate.description: Update Regarding your CCADB Access Request
EmailTemplate.name: Lead Convert
EmailTemplate.subject: Update Regarding your CCADB Access Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Your CA, {!Lead.Company}, has been added to the Common CA Database (CCADB). You will receive another email soon, when your CCADB CA Community License is issued to you.
Please contact support@ccadb.org if you have any questions.
Thanks,
{!Account.Sponsored_By__c}
